description: Try our easy to follow Brie Charcuterie Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Layer cake,High protein,Christmas,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit
name: Brie Charcuterie Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 24 grissini sticks, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place one brie wheel on a serving plate and top with pear slices and dried apricots.
Spread second brie wheel with quince paste and top with walnuts. Place on top of the first brie.

Place remaining brie wheel on top. Top with slices of prosciutto rolled to resemble roses and garnish with grissini sticks. Drizzle assembled brie cake with honey and serve with extra fruit, grissini sticks and drizzled honey.
